system.description: You move yourself or a touched creature from the current plane to another plane of existence. The recipient can bring along objects weighing up to their maximum load. You need a tuning fork attuned to the destination plane. The subject can resist with a Will save; success means the spell fails. If used offensively, you can banish an extraplanar creature back to its home plane (Will negates). The creature can take along objects up to its maximum load. If the spell is used on a creature that is not extraplanar, the spell works but the subject is usually stranded on the destination plane.

components.materialDescription: A forked metal rod. Focus: a tuning fork attuned to the destination plane (minimum 250 gp).

system.target: Creature touched, or up to eight willing creatures joining hands
